overview: Det Voldelige Teater / The Violent Theater is a short documentary portraying the lives of the two danish wrestlers Michael Fynne and Christian "Tank" Vester. Both wrestlers are part of the Aarhus based wrestling promotion, Bodyslam! Pro-Wrestling. The film is the bachelor project of Frank Rosgaard Olsen and Andreas Brink Vestergaard at the film school Multiplatform Storytelling and Production.
title: The Violent Theater
